faqs.q1: How quickly can I get my loan approved?
faqs.a1: Our instant decision system provides a preliminary approval in less than 5 minutes. Final approval typically takes 24 to 48 hours after document verification.
faqs.q2: What is the minimum required credit score?
faqs.a2: We accept applications from clients with various credit profiles. While a score above 650 improves your chances, we evaluate each application individually.
faqs.q3: Can I pay off my loan early without penalties?
faqs.a3: Yes, all our loans allow early repayment without penalties. You'll save on interest by paying off your loan sooner.
faqs.q4: What documents do I need to provide to apply?
faqs.a4: You'll need a valid ID, proof of income (last 3 pay stubs), bank statements, and proof of address. Additional documents may be requested based on your situation.
faqs.q5: How is my monthly payment calculated?
faqs.a5: Your monthly payment depends on the loan amount, duration, and your APR. Use our simulator above for an instant calculation tailored to your needs.
faqs.q6: Does checking rates affect my credit score?
faqs.a6: No, checking your eligibility does not affect your credit score. Only the formal credit application will be recorded in your credit history.

personalLoan.title: Personal Loan
personalLoan.subtitle: From €1,000 to €75,000
personalLoan.description: Finance your dreams with our flexible personal loans. Whether it's a wedding, vacation, medical expenses, or any personal project - we've got you covered.
personalLoan.examplesDisclaimer: *Examples are indicative. Your actual rates and payments may vary based on your credit profile.

guide.whatIsP1: A personal loan is an unsecured loan that provides you with a lump sum of money for personal use. Unlike mortgages or auto loans tied to specific purchases, personal loans offer maximum flexibility.
guide.whatIsP2: At Privat Equity, our personal loans range from €1,000 to €75,000 with repayment terms of 12 to 84 months. We offer competitive fixed interest rates starting from 2.9% APR.

uses.consolidation: Debt consolidation: Combine multiple high-interest debts into one manageable monthly payment
uses.renovation: Home improvements: Renovate your kitchen, add a bathroom, or upgrade your property
uses.purchases: Major purchases: Buy furniture, appliances, or electronics without depleting your savings
uses.medical: Medical expenses: Cover unexpected healthcare costs or elective procedures
uses.wedding: Weddings: Finance your dream wedding without financial stress
uses.education: Education: Pay for courses, certifications, or continuing education
uses.vacation: Vacations: Create memorable experiences with your loved ones
uses.emergency: Emergency expenses: Handle unexpected costs like car repairs or urgent home repairs

guide.qualifyIntro: While eligibility criteria vary by lender, at Privat Equity we generally require applicants to:

qualifyItems.residency: Be a French resident or have a valid residence permit
qualifyItems.income: Have a stable source of income (employed, self-employed, or retired with pension)
qualifyItems.documents: Provide necessary documentation (ID, proof of income, bank statements)

guide.aprIntro: The Annual Percentage Rate (APR) is the total annual cost of your loan expressed as a percentage. Your APR depends on several factors:

aprFactors.creditScore: Credit score: Higher scores typically qualify for lower rates
aprFactors.loanAmount: Loan amount: Larger loans may have different rate structures
aprFactors.loanTerm: Loan term: Shorter terms often have lower rates but higher monthly payments
aprFactors.debtRatio: Debt-to-income ratio: Lower ratios demonstrate better repayment capacity
aprFactors.incomeStability: Income stability: Consistent employment history improves your rate

processSteps.step1: Check your eligibility: Use our simulator to estimate your monthly payments
processSteps.step2: Gather documents: Prepare your ID, proof of income, and bank statements
processSteps.step3: Submit application: Complete our secure online form (takes about 5 minutes)
processSteps.step4: Get instant decision: Receive preliminary approval or denial within minutes
processSteps.step5: Verify information: Our team reviews your application and documents
processSteps.step6: Sign agreement: Review and e-sign your loan contract
processSteps.step7: Receive funds: Money is deposited directly into your bank account

guide.tipsTitle: Tips for getting the best rate

tips.tip1: Check and improve your credit score before applying
tips.tip3: Consider a shorter loan term if you can afford higher monthly payments
tips.tip4: Only borrow what you need - larger loans often have higher rates
tips.tip5: Set up automatic payments to never miss a due date
tips.tip6: Consider a co-borrower if your credit isn't ideal

faqs.q1: What can I use a personal loan for?
faqs.a1: Personal loans are versatile and can be used for almost any legal purpose: weddings, vacations, medical expenses, debt consolidation, renovations, education, or unexpected expenses.
faqs.q2: What is the minimum credit score required?
faqs.a2: While we prefer applicants with a credit score above 650, we evaluate each application individually. A lower score doesn't automatically disqualify you.
faqs.q3: How quickly can I get the money?
faqs.a3: Once your application is approved and all documents verified, funds are typically transferred to your bank account within 24 to 48 hours.
faqs.q4: Are there fees for early repayment?
faqs.a4: No! All our personal loans have no early repayment penalties. You can pay off your loan early and save on interest.
faqs.q5: What documents do I need to provide?
faqs.a5: You'll need a valid ID, proof of income (last 3 payslips or tax returns if self-employed), recent bank statements (last 3 months), and proof of current address.
faqs.q6: Can I apply if I'm self-employed?
faqs.a6: Yes! Self-employed individuals are welcome. You'll need to provide additional documents such as tax returns and business bank statements.
faqs.q7: What is APR and how does it affect my loan?
faqs.a7: APR (Annual Percentage Rate) represents the total annual cost of your loan, including interest and fees. A lower APR means lower overall costs.
faqs.q8: Can I change my monthly payment date?
faqs.a8: Yes, we offer flexibility with payment dates. Contact our customer service to arrange a payment schedule that aligns with your income cycle.
faqs.q9: What happens if I miss a payment?
faqs.a9: We understand that unexpected things happen. If you're struggling to make a payment, contact us immediately. We may be able to arrange a payment plan or temporary deferment.
faqs.a10: Absolutely. We use bank-grade 256-bit SSL encryption and are fully GDPR compliant. Your data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

autoLoan.title: Auto Loan
autoLoan.description: Drive your dream car today with our flexible auto financing options. New or used, we've got you covered.

benefits.newUsed: Financing for new or used vehicles

guide.whatIsP1: An auto loan is a secured loan specifically designed to help you purchase a vehicle. The car itself serves as collateral, which typically results in lower interest rates compared to unsecured personal loans.
guide.whatIsP2: Our competitive rates start from 3.2% APR for qualified borrowers, and the application process is entirely online.
guide.benefitsIntro: Financing your vehicle purchase offers several advantages over paying cash:

benefitsList.savings: Preserve Your Savings: Keep your emergency fund intact while getting the car you need
benefitsList.credit: Build Credit History: Making on-time payments improves your credit score
benefitsList.betterCar: Get a Better Car: Financing allows you to afford a more reliable and safer vehicle
benefitsList.fixedPayments: Fixed Monthly Payments: Budget with confidence knowing your payment won't change
benefitsList.flexibleTerms: Flexible Terms: Choose a repayment period that fits your financial situation
benefitsList.taxBenefits: Tax Benefits: If you use the vehicle for business, loan interest may be tax-deductible

faqs.q1: What's the difference between your financing and dealer financing?
faqs.a1: Getting pre-approved with Privat Equity gives you a guaranteed rate and amount before your search, putting you in a stronger negotiating position.
faqs.q2: Can I finance a used car from a private seller?
faqs.a2: Yes! We finance used vehicles from both dealerships and private sellers. For private sales, we'll need the vehicle's VIN, current mileage, and condition details.
faqs.q3: What's the maximum age for a used car to be financed?
faqs.a3: We typically finance used vehicles up to 8 years old at the time of purchase. Vehicle age, mileage, and condition all influence loan approval.
faqs.q4: Do I need a down payment?
faqs.a4: No down payment is required, though making one (typically 10-20%) can reduce your monthly payments and potentially qualify you for better rates.
faqs.q5: What insurance do I need for a financed vehicle?
faqs.a5: Comprehensive and collision insurance is required for financed vehicles to protect both you and the lender.
faqs.q6: Can I trade in my current vehicle?
faqs.a6: Absolutely! If you own your current vehicle outright, the trade-in value can serve as a down payment.
faqs.q7: Can I refinance my auto loan later?
faqs.a7: Yes! If interest rates drop or your credit improves significantly, you can refinance your auto loan for better terms.
faqs.q8: What happens if my car is totaled or stolen?
faqs.a8: Your comprehensive insurance should cover the vehicle's value. Any insurance payment first goes to pay off your loan balance.
faqs.q9: Can I pay off my auto loan early?
faqs.a9: Yes! There are no early repayment penalties on our auto loans. Paying off your loan early saves you money on interest.
faqs.q10: What if the car I want costs less than my approved amount?
faqs.a10: Perfect! You'll simply borrow the amount you need for the vehicle purchase plus associated costs. There's no obligation to borrow the full approved amount.

guide.introP1: A business loan is financing specifically designed to meet the needs of businesses, craftsmen, merchants, and professionals. Unlike personal loans, it is intended to finance projects related to your professional activity: equipment acquisition, commercial development, working capital, or expansion.
guide.introP2: At Privat Equity, we offer business loans from €5,000 to €75,000 with repayment terms of 12 to 84 months. Our competitive rates starting from 6.5% APR are adapted to the economic realities of SMEs and entrepreneurs.

types.shortTerm: Short-term credit: 3 to 12-month financing for immediate cash needs, ideal for managing cash flow gaps or financing seasonal stock.
types.mediumTerm: Medium-term credit: 1 to 5-year financing for material investments such as purchasing equipment, vehicles, or machinery.
types.longTerm: Long-term credit: 5 to 15-year financing for major expansion projects, premises acquisition, or professional real estate investments.
types.creditLine: Credit line: Renewable cash facility to manage daily cash flow fluctuations.

guide.eligibilityIntro: To obtain a business loan at Privat Equity, you generally must:

eligibility.registered: Have a registered business (sole trader, LLC, SAS, etc.)
eligibility.activity: Demonstrate economic activity of at least 6 to 12 months
eligibility.documents: Provide required financial documents (balance sheets, income statements, etc.)
eligibility.project: Have a clearly defined professional project

guide.documentsIntro: Here are the documents generally required when applying for a business loan:

documents.kbis: Company registration extract (less than 3 months old)
documents.financials: Balance sheets and income statements for the last 2 fiscal years
documents.bankStatements: Business bank statements for the last 6 months

tips.tip1: Prepare a complete and organized file to speed up processing
tips.tip2: Present realistic and justified financial projections
tips.tip3: Build a personal contribution of at least 10-20% of the project
tips.tip4: Maintain healthy cash flow in the months before application
tips.tip5: Anticipate your needs: apply before you're in difficulty

faq.q1: What's the difference between a business loan and a personal loan?
faq.a1: A business loan is intended to finance your professional activity and requires accounting documents from your business. It generally offers higher amounts and conditions adapted to business economic cycles. A personal loan finances your personal needs and relies solely on your individual income.
faq.q2: Can I get a business loan as a sole trader/freelancer?
faq.a2: Yes, sole traders and freelancers can absolutely apply for a business loan. You'll need to provide your turnover declarations, bank statements, and demonstrate at least 6 to 12 months of activity. Amounts granted depend on your activity level.
faq.q3: How long does it take to get a response?
faq.a3: At Privat Equity, you receive a preliminary response within 24 to 48 hours. Fund release generally occurs within 5 to 10 business days after complete file validation and document signing.
faq.q4: Do I need collateral for my business loan?
faq.a4: For small amounts (up to €25,000), no collateral is generally required. For higher amounts, a personal guarantee from the director or a lien on business assets may be requested depending on the risk profile.
faq.q5: Can I repay my business loan early?
faq.a5: Yes, all our business loans allow early repayment. Depending on the amount and remaining term, early repayment penalties may apply (generally limited to 6 months of interest). These conditions are clearly indicated in your contract.
faq.q6: How are rates determined for businesses?
faq.a6: Rates depend on several criteria: business age, financial health (ratios, cash flow), loan amount and term, industry sector, and proposed guarantees. Businesses with a solid balance sheet and stable activity get the best rates.
faq.q7: Can I apply if my business is being created?
faq.a7: Yes, we support business creators. You'll need to present a solid business plan, credible financial projections, and ideally a personal contribution. Amounts and conditions will be adapted to your project's development stage.
faq.q8: What expenses can I finance with a business loan?
faq.a8: A business loan can finance almost all your business needs: equipment and machinery, utility vehicles, stock and raw materials, marketing campaigns, recruitment, IT development, renovation work, working capital, etc.
